Articles.Content:
A week to do what?

A week of relative popularity :3

Yes i was moderate because I'm new

but I have enough message to post live now ;-)

And for the texture 16k https://mega.co.nz/#F!8EAnSL5Z!OAyLBQqrQtlmfL0GT8fcQg!EBYyXRxA

No not really. If I can find the planet textures in some slightly higher textures I might consider it. But it's not even close to a priority.

We need to convert you to the cult of the 8k*4k planet textures I see.... anyhows.. this was very educational...

Yes i was moderate because I'm new

but I have enough message to post live now ;-)

Yep and had I seen your texture test earlier (Or rather, where the topic was when you posted it) I'd not even have bothered going higher than 8k. Oh well ;P Welcome to the "real-time" forums by the way.

We need to convert you to the cult of the 8k*4k planet textures I see.... anyhows.. this was very educational...

I think my first version of kerbin was a higher resolution that I found off the internet (and I can't find it anymore and I deleted every copy of it) but I dropped the resolution down because anything higher than 4k x 2k is absurd.
Calling it now: This is gonna hit the mod spotlight in the next weekly update.
It had better! It's the best thing to happen to the game, appearance-wise.
Anyone got any idea for planet texture that is not HD or with clouds?

Anyone got any idea for planet texture that is not HD or with clouds?

Maybe make Moho angry red like how it used to be?

I think my first version of kerbin was a higher resolution that I found off the internet (and I can't find it anymore and I deleted every copy of it) but I dropped the resolution down because anything higher than 4k x 2k is absurd.

Well bac9 was right to criticize 4k textures in games like Oblivion, but for PLANETS (mapped spherical) you want to go WAY WAY beyond that. 8k*4k is the minimal planet texture for my taste... ;p The difference is ... worlds. (Also it's highest texture res supported by d3d9 api)

Edited August 9, 2013 by eRe4s3r
This is ridiculous how long has this been here? Ive been looking for graphical mods since day one this is great. Is it possible to upgrade the original planets textures?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Wow haven't been on the KSP forums and to my surprise one of my longest awaited mods is out in the wild! Great work thank you!

This is ridiculous how long has this been here? Ive been looking for graphical mods since day one this is great. Is it possible to upgrade the original planets textures?

7days, and Yes

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer?p=580817&viewfull=1#post580817

This is ridiculous how long has this been here? Ive been looking for graphical mods since day one this is great. Is it possible to upgrade the original planets textures?

Read the OP under Texture Packs: eran100's Sol System

Here, I made a new Moho which I actully really like I might even keep it in my game! I made Moho more red and gave at the feeling of close to the sun. Here's a picture:

Download link: https://mega.co.nz/#!x85BTawa!JYF6YhwExgvcUuJo_hdLuWCbpv5L2Uk4ibZ8oYuKCKM

Instructions: Put Moho in Textures/Planets

Hope you like it!

*BTW I had to lower the resulotion of Moho for this... I hope you don't mind*

If you want I can work on it a little bit more.

Edited August 9, 2013 by eran100
That actually looks really cool! Well, not really cool. Really hot. Like, it looks all scorched. Thank you!

That actually looks really cool! Well, not really cool. Really hot. Like, it looks all scorched. Thank you!

No problem, By the way, 200 POSTS

Any more requests?

Edited August 9, 2013 by eran100

Hmm yes that is quite nice.

I would ask for a less-brightly coloured Minimus, but I'm hesitant to completely change the textures of bodies like that because they just revert to the default if you're close enough. But with that Moho doesn't really matter because it's pretty much the same as the ground colour. So I might start using that.

Hmm yes that is quite nice.

I would ask for a less-brightly coloured Minimus, but I'm hesitant to completely change the textures of bodies like that because they just revert to the default if you're close enough. But with that Moho doesn't really matter because it's pretty much the same as the ground colour. So I might start using that.

You want Minmus that is less white/bright?

EDITING IS THE BEST THING EVER

I'd kill for a Minmus with the same default colorset (as it is something very special with this moon, and Jeb will have to deal with it anyway when he will crash on it and stay there waiting for rescue), but with higher resolution. I don't know if this is related to its small size requiring zooming in, but Minmus really looks low quality and blurry when you look at it in the map.

I'd kill for a Minmus with the same default colorset (as it is something very special with this moon, and Jeb will have to deal with it anyway when he will crash on it and stay there waiting for rescue), but with higher resolution. I don't know if this is related to its small size requiring zooming in, but Minmus really looks low quality and blurry when you look at it in the map.
